title: President Donald Trump's Attack on DEI
transcript: The term diversity, equity, and inclusion began right after the Civil Rights Act. Signing executive orders to end DEI offices, terminating affirmative action enforcement for federal contractors, and eliminating federal DEI positions across multiple agencies. DEI at HUD is dead.
